text: Slavitza Jovan (born 28 December 1954) is a Serbian actress and former model known for her appearance as the apocalyptic deity Gozer The Gozerian in the 1984 film Ghostbusters. She made later appearances in Body Double, House on Haunted Hill, and Terrence Malick's Knight of Cups. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Film ! Role !
